title: Nicki Minaj reveals she could be married to jailbird fiancé Kenneth Petty 'in the next seven days'
text:
Nicki Minaj has revealed she could marry her convict fiancé Kenneth Petty in the next week.

The Starships rapper, 36, who was first linked to convicted sex offender Kenneth, 41, back in November before confirming their engagement in the summer, told E! News wedding bells for the couple are just around the corner.

She said: 'We've gotten our marriage license, but there's a particular pastor who I want to officiate and so she was just made available as of today.

Wedding bells: Nicki Minaj has revealed she could marry her convict fiancé Kenneth Petty in the next week

'She told me she's available within the next week, so we could be married in the next seven days.'

When asked if she had picked out a bridal gown for her wedding day with the ceremony just around the corner, the Beez In The Trap hitmaker said: 'That's too much. I can't. There's no way. That will take too long to plan. I'm not good with that. I'm a procrastinator, so it would come in, like, two years from now.'

The star also said that getting married before starting a family was important to her although there is no set timeline on when she would like to have children.

Adding that she and Kenneth are 'so sexually attracted to one another', the beauty steamily admitted that her fiance is the only man that can tell her what to do because of his prowess in the bedroom.

Romance: The Starships rapper, 36, who was first linked to Kenneth, 41, back in November before confirming their engagement in the summer, told E! News wedding bells for the couple are just around the corner

On her show Queen Radio this August, Nicki shared that she was 'about 80 days' away from finally tying the knot with her sex offender beau.

Nicki said she and Kenneth 'filed for the marriage license and we still had to pick it up and I was traveling, by the time I came back, we had to renew it again.'

She dished: 'From that time, you have 90 days to get married. That was about a week ago, so now I have about 80 days.'

Kenneth spent seven years behind bars for first degree manslaughter, which he pleaded guilty to after being charged with second degree murder, TMZ reported.

Citing insiders in law enforcement, the website claimed that Kenneth shot one Lamont Robinson three times on a street corner in Queens in April 2002.

She said: '(The pastor) told me she's available within the next week, so we could be married in the next seven days.'

Kenneth and some associates allegedly drove to a point across the street from Lamont, whereupon Kenneth emerged from the vehicle and walked over to his victim before firing into his stomach.

Lamont identified a photograph of his killer to police before dying in the hospital shortly after being shot, per court documents.

An investigator dismissed the reason for the shooting as 'bulls***' to TMZ, whose sources theorized that the violence was gang-related.

Kenneth earned his sex offender status after being convicted in 1995 of the first degree attempted rape of a 16-year-old girl.

He made use of a 'knife/cutting instrument' during the crime, according to public records from the New York Division Of Criminal Justice Services.
description: Nicki Minaj has revealed she could marry her convict fiancé Kenneth Petty in the next week.
